---

#  The country that is known for its lanuage and people. Finland is also known as the land of a thousand lakes, yet there are actually more than 180,000 lakes in Finland. Of course many of the lakes are small. The population of Finland is about 5.6 milion.

##

* The average price of a 7-day trip to Finland in July is US$1303 for a solo traveler and US$1472 for a couple. Off-season travel may be up to 48 % cheaper. The average cost of a 7-day trip to Finland during off-season is US$671 for a solo traveler and US$840 for a couple.
